mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (writer, title, content, password, readCount ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{password}, #{readCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE BOARD SET readCount = readCount + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
